title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti until al dente.
Fry the bacon in a pan until crispy.
Beat the eggs and mix with grated Parmesan cheese.
Toss the cooked spaghetti with the bacon and egg mixture.
Serve with black pepper on top.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken with tikka masala spices and grill until cooked.
Heat tomato puree in a pan and add cream.
Add grilled chicken to the sauce and cook for 10 minutes.
Serve with rice or naan bread.
